title: Pensioner survives despite getting crushed under lorry on mobility scooter
text:
Shoppers were stunned to see the elderly woman’s brush with death (Picture: SWNS)

These heart-stopping pictures show the moment an elderly woman’s mobility scooter is nearly flattened by a truck.

Shocked shoppers dashed to help the pensioner, who was left trapped inside the vehicle after it was flipped onto its side.

Pictures taken at the scene in Boston High Street, Lincolnshire, show the woman being taken away on a stretcher while police quiz the driver.

Despite the near miss, which took place yesterday around 11.30am, the woman escaped with minor injuries and the driver was released by officers.

A Lincolnshire Police spokesperson said: ‘The woman suffered minor injuries. It could have certainly been worse than it was.’

She was taken away on a stretcher but only suffered minor injuries (Picture: SWNS)

Police quizzed the lorry driver but later released them (Picture: SWNS)

The elderly woman was trapped inside when her mobility scooter was toppled over (Picture: SWNS)

Witness Adam Martin, 30, said: ‘The little old lady crossed the road in the scooter and suddenly this HGV knocked straight into her.

‘Luckily the lorry was only going slowly because the road is quite narrow, otherwise she’d have been killed.

‘People helped her out and ambulance crews came pretty quick. It could have been so much worse.’

description: An elderly woman in Boston, Lincolnshire, survived with only minor injuries after an HGV crashed into her mobility scooter.
